name: UI/UX Designer
prompt: Design a livestream homepage with video player, chat sidebar, nav bar, and responsive layout for mobile and desktop

name: WebRTC Engineer
prompt: Implement real-time video streaming infrastructure with TURN/STUN servers, SFU cluster configuration, and JWT authentication

name: Backend Developer

name: Moderation Agent

name: DevOps Engineer
